sys_hub_flow.description: Flow to find Needit Tasks older then the number of days in the auto close application property, close them, and open a follow-up task for management.
sys_hub_flow.name: Find and Close Long Needit Task
sys_hub_flow.sys_name: Find and Close Long Needit Task

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get number of days old someting should be to be closed automatically.

flow.display_value: Find and Close Long Needit Task

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Calculate the date days ago based on the property.

sys_element_mapping.value: Needit Task {{08208b59-7463-40d7-91ce-7ea1f95fddf0.item.number}} was automatically closed because its due date of {{08208b59-7463-40d7-91ce-7ea1f95fddf0.item.due_date}} was older then the autiCloseOverdue setting of {{0e208aec-fb01-4317-94d7-f60c68b3524b.property_value}} days.
